verses.verse: And Balaam <WH1109> said <WH559> unto <WH413> Balak, <WH1111> Build <WH1129> me here <WH2088> seven <WH7651> altars, <WH4196> and prepare <WH3559> me here <WH2088> seven <WH7651> oxen <WH6499> and seven <WH7651> rams. <WH352>
And Balak <WH1111> did <WH6213> as <WH834> Balaam <WH1109> had spoken; <WH1696> and Balak <WH1111> and Balaam <WH1109> offered <WH5927> on every altar <WH4196> a bullock <WH6499> and a ram. <WH352>

And Balaam <WH1109> said <WH559> unto Balak, <WH1111> Stand <WH3320> by <WH5921> thy burnt offering, <WH5930> and I will go: <WH1980> peradventure <WH194> the LORD <WH3068> will come <WH7136> to meet <WH7125> me: and whatsoever <WH1697> <WH4100> he showeth <WH7200> me I will tell <WH5046> thee. And he went <WH1980> to a high place. <WH8205>

And God <WH430> met <WH7136> <WH413> Balaam: <WH1109> and he said <WH559> unto <WH413> him, I have prepared <WH6186> <WH853> seven <WH7651> altars, <WH4196> and I have offered <WH5927> upon every altar <WH4196> a bullock <WH6499> and a ram. <WH352>
And the LORD <WH3068> put <WH7760> a word <WH1697> in Balaam's <WH1109> mouth, <WH6310> and said, <WH559> Return <WH7725> unto <WH413> Balak, <WH1111> and thus <WH3541> thou shalt speak. <WH1696>
And he returned <WH7725> unto <WH413> him, and, lo, <WH2009> he stood <WH5324> by <WH5921> his burnt sacrifice, <WH5930> he, <WH1931> and all <WH3605> the princes <WH8269> of Moab. <WH4124>

And he took up <WH5375> his parable, <WH4912> and said, <WH559> Balak <WH1111> the king <WH4428> of Moab <WH4124> hath brought <WH5148> me from <WH4480> Aram, <WH758> out of the mountains <WH4480> <WH2042> of the east, <WH6924> saying, Come, <WH1980> curse <WH779> me Jacob, <WH3290> and come, <WH1980> defy <WH2194> Israel. <WH3478>
How <WH4100> shall I curse, <WH6895> whom God <WH410> hath not <WH3808> cursed? <WH6895> or how <WH4100> shall I defy, <WH2194> whom the LORD <WH3068> hath not <WH3808> defied? <WH2194>

For <WH3588> from the top <WH4480> <WH7218> of the rocks <WH6697> I see <WH7200> him, and from the hills <WH4480> <WH1389> I behold <WH7789> him: lo, <WH2005> the people <WH5971> shall dwell <WH7931> alone, <WH910> and shall not <WH3808> be reckoned <WH2803> among the nations. <WH1471>

Who <WH4310> can count <WH4487> the dust <WH6083> of Jacob, <WH3290> and the number <WH4557> of <WH853> the fourth <WH7255> part of Israel? <WH3478> Let me <WH5315> die <WH4191> the death <WH4194> of the righteous, <WH3477> and let my last end <WH319> be <WH1961> like his! <WH3644>

And Balak <WH1111> said <WH559> unto <WH413> Balaam, <WH1109> What <WH4100> hast thou done <WH6213> unto me? I took <WH3947> thee to curse <WH6895> mine enemies, <WH341> and, behold, <WH2009> thou hast blessed them altogether. <WH1288> <WH1288>
And he answered <WH6030> and said, <WH559> Must I not <WH3808> take heed <WH8104> to speak <WH1696> that <WH853> which <WH834> the LORD <WH3068> hath put <WH7760> in my mouth? <WH6310>

And Balak <WH1111> said <WH559> unto <WH413> him, Come, <WH1980> I pray thee, <WH4994> with <WH854> me unto <WH413> another <WH312> place, <WH4725> from whence <WH834> <WH4480> <WH8033> thou mayest see <WH7200> them: thou shalt see <WH7200> but <WH657> the utmost part <WH7097> of them, and shalt not <WH3808> see <WH7200> them all: <WH3605> and curse <WH6895> me them from thence. <WH4480> <WH8033>

And he brought <WH3947> him into the field <WH7704> of Zophim, <WH6839> to <WH413> the top <WH7218> of Pisgah, <WH6449> and built <WH1129> seven <WH7651> altars, <WH4196> and offered <WH5927> a bullock <WH6499> and a ram <WH352> on every altar. <WH4196>
And he said <WH559> unto <WH413> Balak, <WH1111> Stand <WH3320> here <WH3541> by <WH5921> thy burnt offering, <WH5930> while I <WH595> meet <WH7136> the LORD yonder. <WH3541>

And the LORD <WH3068> met <WH7136> <WH413> Balaam, <WH1109> and put <WH7760> a word <WH1697> in his mouth, <WH6310> and said, <WH559> Go again <WH7725> unto <WH413> Balak, <WH1111> and say <WH1696> thus. <WH3541>

And when he came <WH935> to <WH413> him, behold, <WH2009> he stood <WH5324> by <WH5921> his burnt offering, <WH5930> and the princes <WH8269> of Moab <WH4124> with <WH854> him. And Balak <WH1111> said <WH559> unto him, What <WH4100> hath the LORD <WH3068> spoken? <WH1696>
And he took up <WH5375> his parable, <WH4912> and said, <WH559> Rise up, <WH6965> Balak, <WH1111> and hear; <WH8085> hearken <WH238> unto <WH5704> me, thou son <WH1121> of Zippor: <WH6834>

God <WH410> is not <WH3808> a man, <WH376> that he should lie; <WH3576> neither the son <WH1121> of man, <WH120> that he should repent: <WH5162> hath he <WH1931> said, <WH559> and shall he not <WH3808> do <WH6213> it? or hath he spoken, <WH1696> and shall he not <WH3808> make it good? <WH6965>
Behold, <WH2009> I have received <WH3947> commandment to bless: <WH1288> and he hath blessed; <WH1288> and I cannot <WH3808> reverse <WH7725> it.

He hath not <WH3808> beheld <WH5027> iniquity <WH205> in Jacob, <WH3290> neither <WH3808> hath he seen <WH7200> perverseness <WH5999> in Israel: <WH3478> the LORD <WH3068> his God <WH430> is with <WH5973> him, and the shout <WH8643> of a king <WH4428> is among them.
God <WH410> brought them out <WH3318> of Egypt; <WH4480> <WH4714> he hath as it were the strength <WH8443> of a unicorn. <WH7214>

Surely <WH3588> there is no <WH3808> enchantment <WH5173> against Jacob, <WH3290> neither <WH3808> is there any divination <WH7081> against Israel: <WH3478> according to this time <WH6256> it shall be said <WH559> of Jacob <WH3290> and of Israel, <WH3478> What <WH4100> hath God <WH410> wrought! <WH6466>

Behold, <WH2005> the people <WH5971> shall rise up <WH6965> as a great lion, <WH3833> and lift up himself <WH5375> as a young lion: <WH738> he shall not <WH3808> lie down <WH7901> until <WH5704> he eat <WH398> of the prey, <WH2964> and drink <WH8354> the blood <WH1818> of the slain. <WH2491>
And Balak <WH1111> said <WH559> unto <WH413> Balaam, <WH1109> Neither <WH1571> <WH3808> curse them at all, <WH6895> <WH6895> nor <WH1571> <WH3808> bless them at all. <WH1288> <WH1288>

But Balaam <WH1109> answered <WH6030> and said <WH559> unto <WH413> Balak, <WH1111> Told <WH1696> <WH413> not <WH3808> I thee, saying, <WH559> All <WH3605> that <WH834> the LORD <WH3068> speaketh, <WH1696> that I must do? <WH6213>

And Balak <WH1111> said <WH559> unto <WH413> Balaam, <WH1109> Come, <WH1980> I pray thee, <WH4994> I will bring <WH3947> thee unto <WH413> another <WH312> place; <WH4725> peradventure <WH194> it will please <WH3474> <WH5869> God <WH430> that thou mayest curse <WH6895> me them from thence. <WH4480> <WH8033>
And Balak <WH1111> brought <WH3947> <WH853> Balaam <WH1109> unto the top <WH7218> of Peor, <WH6465> that looketh <WH8259> toward <WH5921> <WH6440> Jeshimon. <WH3452>

And Balaam <WH1109> said <WH559> unto <WH413> Balak, <WH1111> Build <WH1129> me here <WH2088> seven <WH7651> altars, <WH4196> and prepare <WH3559> me here <WH2088> seven <WH7651> bullocks <WH6499> and seven <WH7651> rams. <WH352>
And Balak <WH1111> did <WH6213> as <WH834> Balaam <WH1109> had said, <WH559> and offered <WH5927> a bullock <WH6499> and a ram <WH352> on every altar. <WH4196>
